attributes.additional_details: Because there the best thing to help BA survive, as well as the 120000 staff members that could loose there jobs, BA bring a hell of a lot of revenue into your economy each year so it’s your time to help them, they help you all year round.
attributes.background: I would like the government to help save jobs at BA

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do to save British Airways. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319227
